jld.title: Positive Reviews Impact LSA Performance
description: Did you know that reviews are one of the known ranking factors for your Google Local Services Ads (LSAs)? For Justia Amplify clients, we ease the process of getting reviews with customized pages for requesting reviews on various platforms.
